EmailTemplate.description: Notification to the SA coordinator to RTS entire wine consignment
EmailTemplate.name: SSSW SA Wine Network Notification Entire RTS
EmailTemplate.subject: eParcel Damage Instructions - RTS for entire consignment: {!Case.ReferenceID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Wine Customer has provided instructions to RTS the entire damaged article via Netley PDC Case {!Case.CaseNumber} has been created for {!Contact.LastName}.
Consignment ID: {!Case.ReferenceID__c} Please click this link to view the Case: {!Case.Link}
Thank you for reporting the damaged parcel {!Case.ReferenceID__c} to the eParcel Damages Team. The sender has requested that the entire consignment is to be delivered to the address detailed below.
INSTRUCTIONS
1. Please attach the yellow 'Damaged article - not for delivery' stickers to the whole consignment and record the reference number {!Case.CaseNumber}.
2. Please ensure that the appropriate Damage & RTS event scans are recorded in EM prior to dispatch.
3. Please repack damaged carton (ensure addressee details are included), and print this Case.
4. Fold where indicated and affix address label to return all parcels.
Regards,
Australia Post Customer Contact Centre
FOR YOUR CONVENIENCE FOLD OR CUT HERE AND TAPE TO DAMAGED CARTON
SA WINE Co-ordinator Netley Parcel Delivery Centre Attn: David Marshall 368 Richmond Road NETLEY SA 5037
